Text.Page:
With all due respect to my fellow soldiers, we're going about this all wrong.

The nagas are coming here for a reason: to restore the temple and bring back Dagon. Take away that reason, and the nagas will go away.

I figure the {@LinkCreature:10#15#naga seeresses} are the key. Take them out and the naga's will be weaker. Then we'll have 'em!

Fine work. Those seeresses aren't easy kills, I know.

I'll study these stones you collected. It may help us further disrupt their plans.

Just because the {@LinkCreature:10#15#naga seeresses} claim to "wield power over life and death" doesn't mean you can't kill them.

Trust me. They bleed just fine.
